item.title: 关税促使 5 月份美国从中国进口的服装创 22 年新低
item.description: 最新的贸易数据显示，5月份从中国进口到美国的服装价值降至22年来的最低月度水平，凸显了美国大幅关税的影响。【原文：The value of apparel imports from China to the U.S. fell in May to its lowest monthly level in 22 years, according to latest trade data, highlighting the impact of steep U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，预计美国国家航空航天局将有 2000 多名高级雇员离职
item.description: Politico 周三援引该媒体获得的文件报道称，美国国家航空航天局（National Aeronautics and Space Adminstration）的约 2,145 名高级雇员将在裁员计划的推动下离职。【原文：Around 2,145 senior-ranking employees at the U.S. National Aeronautics and Space Adminstration are set to leave under a push to shed staff, Politico reported on Wednesday citing documents obtained by the news outlet.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英国 Revolut 公司正在洽谈以 650 亿美元的估值进行新一轮融资
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道称，总部位于伦敦的金融科技巨头 Revolut 正在洽谈以 650 亿美元的估值获得新的融资。【原文：London-based financial technology giant Revolut is in talks to secure new funding at a valuation of $65 billion, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达 4 万亿美元里程碑为股市巨头的崛起画上句号
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）以惊人的速度崛起，成为首家估值达 4 万亿美元的上市公司，这凸显了人工智能芯片制造商和科技行业对股市的巨大重要性。【原文：The stunning rise of Nvidia Corp to become the first publicly traded company valued at $4 trillion underscores the massive importance to the stock market of the AI chipmaker and the technology sector.】

item.title: 会议纪要显示，华尔街推延美联储资产负债表缩减的结束时间
item.description: 美国中央银行 6 月 17 日至 18 日的政策会议纪要显示，金融市场参与者再次推迟了美联储缩减庞大资产负债表规模努力的结束日期。【原文：Financial market participants have pushed out yet again the end date for the effort to shrink the size of the Federal Reserve's large balance sheet, the minutes of the U.S. central bank's June 17-18 policy meeting showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 华为公司高管表示将在巴西投资数据中心
item.description: 中国科技巨头华为公司[RIC:RIC:HWT.UL]的一位高管周三告诉路透社，华为有兴趣投资巴西的数据中心市场，但正在等待当地政府的一项法案，以最终确定其在巴西的战略。【原文：Chinese tech giant Huawei [RIC:RIC:HWT.UL] is interested in investing in Brazil's data center market but is waiting for a local government bill to finalize its strategy for the country, an executive told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 法国竞争管理机构将调查 Meta 的在线广告行为
item.description: 法国竞争管理机构周三表示，它已通知 Meta Platforms，Facebook 的所有者被指控滥用其在网络广告领域的支配地位。【原文：The French competition authority said on Wednesday it had informed Meta Platforms that the Facebook owner was accused of abusing its dominant position in the online advertising sector.】

item.title: 美国参议院投票确认共和党首席执行官出任联邦航空管理局局长
item.description: 美国参议院周三以 53 票对 43 票批准共和航空公司首席执行官布莱恩-贝德福德（Bryan Bedford）担任联邦航空管理局局长。【原文：The U.S. Senate Wednesday voted 53 to 43 approve Republic Airways CEO Bryan Bedford to head the Federal Aviation Administration.】

item.title: 优步（Uber）被指定为洛杉矶奥运会官方共享出行和送餐合作伙伴
item.description: 优步（Uber）周三宣布，优步将成为洛杉矶 2028 年奥运会和残奥会以及美国队的官方共享出行和按需配送合作伙伴。【原文：Uber will serve as the official rideshare and on-demand delivery partner of the Los Angeles 2028 Olympic and Paralympic Games, as well as Team USA, organisers announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，微软在裁员的同时，在人工智能方面节省了超过 5 亿美元的开支
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三报道，微软去年仅在呼叫中心使用人工智能就节省了 5 亿多美元。【原文：Microsoft saved more than $500 million in its call centers alone last year by using artificial intelligence, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国延长对三家墨西哥金融机构的芬太尼制裁期限
item.description: 美国财政部周三表示，已将禁止涉及三家墨西哥金融机构的某些交易的最后期限延长至 9 月 4 日，这三家墨西哥金融机构上个月因涉嫌与芬太尼贩运有关的洗钱活动而受到制裁。【原文：The U.S. Treasury said on Wednesday it had extended a deadline to September 4 for a prohibition on certain transactions involving three Mexican financial institutions hit by sanctions last month over alleged money laundering linked to fentanyl trafficking.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税：哪些措施已经生效，哪些措施可能会出台？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发起了一场全球贸易战，针对个别产品和国家征收一系列关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has launched a global trade war with an array of tariffs that target individual products and countries.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要显示本月晚些时候降息支持率不高
item.description: 在美联储 6 月 17 日至 18 日的会议上，只有 "几位 "官员表示他们认为最快可能在本月内降息，大多数决策者仍然担心唐纳德-特朗普总统利用进口税重塑全球贸易所带来的通胀压力。【原文：Only "a couple" of officials at the Federal Reserve's June 17-18 meeting said they felt interest rates could be reduced as soon as this month, with most policymakers remaining worried about the inflationary pressure they expect to come from President Donald Trump's use of import taxes to reshape global trade.】

item.title: 独家报道OpenAI 将发布网络浏览器挑战谷歌 Chrome 浏览器
item.description: 三位熟知内情的人士告诉路透社，OpenAI即将发布一款人工智能驱动的网络浏览器，该浏览器将挑战Alphabet主导市场的谷歌Chrome浏览器。【原文：OpenAI is close to releasing an AI-powered web browser that will challenge Alphabet's market-dominating Google Chrome, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，美国审查中国人工智能存在意识形态偏见
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份备忘录称，美国官员一直在悄悄地对中国的人工智能项目进行评分，看其是否能按照中国共产党的官方路线塑造自己的产出。【原文：American officials have quietly been grading Chinese artificial intelligence programs on their ability to mold their output to the Chinese Communist Party's official line, according to a memo reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: T-Mobile 终止 DEI 计划，同时寻求 FCC 批准两项交易
item.description: 无线运营商 T-Mobile US 周三表示，在特朗普政府的压力下，以及在寻求监管部门批准两项重大交易之际，该公司将终止其多元化、公平和包容计划。【原文：Wireless carrier T-Mobile US said on Wednesday it is ending its diversity, equity and inclusion programs under pressure from the Trump administration and as it seeks regulatory approval for two major deals.】

item.title: 以色列 Cyberstarts 启动 3 亿美元基金帮助初创企业留住人才
item.description: 以色列风险投资基金 Cyberstarts 周三表示，该基金已启动一项 3 亿美元的基金，旨在帮助其投资组合公司吸引和留住网络安全人才。【原文：Israeli venture capital fund Cyberstarts has launched a $300 million fund aimed at helping its portfolio companies attract and retain cybersecurity talent, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 过去十年涉及美国制药商和生物技术公司的重大交易
item.description: 默克公司将以约 100 亿美元的价格收购英国维罗纳制药公司（Verona Pharma），这也是这家美国制药商在其癌症治疗大片 Keytruda 之外实现多元化战略的一部分。【原文：Merck is acquiring UK-based Verona Pharma for about $10 billion, as part of the U.S. drugmaker's strategy to diversify beyond its blockbuster cancer treatment Keytruda.】

item.title: 特斯拉投资者要求董事会为逾期未召开的年度股东大会确定日期
item.description: 27名特斯拉大股东周三敦促这家电动汽车制造商的董事会确定今年召开年度股东大会的日期，理由是法律义务和日益增长的治理问题。【原文：A group of 27 major Tesla shareholders urged the electric automaker's board on Wednesday to set a date for its annual shareholder meeting this year, citing legal obligations and growing governance concerns.】

item.title: 与 4 月 2 日的税率相比，特朗普提高了对各国的关税税率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三发出新的信函，通知各国提高关税税率，继续推行他的 "美国优先 "政策，重新调整全球贸易秩序。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump issued new letters on Wednesday notifying countries of higher tariff rates as he continues his "America First" policies and reorders global trade.】

item.title: X 在埃隆-马斯克领导下的波折历程
item.description: X 公司首席执行官琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）周三出人意料地表示，她将离职，结束在伊隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下社交媒体平台的任期。【原文：The CEO of X, Linda Yaccarino, said on Wednesday she would step down from the role in a surprise move, ending her tenure at the Elon Musk-owned social media platform that has faced several controversies and challenges including a mass exodus of advertisers from the site.】

item.title: 据 Folha 报道，摩洛哥皇家航空公司正在洽谈购买巴西航空工业公司的飞机
item.description: 圣保罗页报》（Folha de S.Paulo）周三援引摩洛哥皇家航空公司首席执行官阿卜杜勒哈米德-阿德农（Abdelhamid Adnoun）的话报道说，摩洛哥皇家航空公司正在与巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）就可能订购该公司的 E2 飞机进行谈判。【原文：Royal Air Maroc is in talks with Embraer for a potential order for the Brazilian planemaker' s E2 aircraft, newspaper Folha de S.Paulo reported on Wednesday citing the airline's CEO, Abdelhamid Adnoun.】

item.title: 美国对南非征收关税将打击白人农民 特朗普表示支持
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对南非出口商品征收 30% 的关税，这必将对他曾大声疾呼并备受争议的群体--白人农民--造成经济打击。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened 30% tariff on South African exports is set to deal an economic blow to a community he has vocally and controversially championed: white farmers.】

item.title: 通用汽车支持的 EnergyX 公司购买美国 Smackover 地层富锂矿区
item.description: 由通用汽车公司（General Motors）支持的锂技术初创公司 EnergyX 从 Pantera Lithium 手中买下了 Smackover 地层中的 3.5 万英亩土地，这是为获得盛产电池金属的美国卤水地层而达成的最新交易。【原文：EnergyX, the lithium technology startup backed by General Motors , has bought 35,000 acres in the Smackover formation from Pantera Lithium , the latest deal for access to the U.S. brine formation teeming with supplies of the battery metal.】

item.title: 关税威胁导致铜供应过剩，美国铜价泡沫破灭
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对铜征收 50%的关税，使美国金属价格出现创纪录的溢价。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's 50% tariff on copper has placed a record premium on prices of the metal in the United States that is likely to ease over the coming months as a stockpile created by traders anticipating the levy works through the system.】

item.title: 谷歌称搜索结果不和谐问题尚未解决；面临欧盟反垄断罚款风险
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌（Google）本周表示，它未能解决与酒店、航空公司和 Skyscanner 等专业搜索服务公司在如何呈现搜索结果方面的分歧，这使它面临被欧盟处以巨额反垄断罚款的风险。【原文：Alphabet's Google said it failed this week to resolve disagreements with hotels, airlines and specialised search services such as Skyscanner over how it presents search results, putting it at risk of a hefty European Union antitrust fine.】

item.title: 智利和墨西哥为特朗普宣布征收铜关税做好准备
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）周三表示，墨西哥可以重新安排通常运往美国的铜，以避免特朗普政府征收关税；而智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇（Gabriel Boric）则表示，他尚未收到美国方面的回复，并呼吁进行 "官方 "沟通。【原文：President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Wednesday Mexico could redirect the copper it typically sends to the U.S. to avoid tariffs from the Trump administration, while her Chilean counterpart Gabriel Boric said he had yet to hear from the U.S. and called for "official" communication.】

item.title: 保时捷预计 4 月和 5 月将面临 3.51 亿美元的关税打击
item.description: 保时捷这家豪华跑车制造商在季度业绩公布前的投资者电话会议后发布的幻灯片中表示，由于在4月和5月吸收了美国的进口关税，该公司的业绩预计将受到3亿欧元（3.51亿美元）的冲击。【原文：Porsche expects a 300 million euro ($351 million) hit to results as a consequence of absorbing U.S. import tariffs in April and May, the luxury sportscar manufacturer said in slides published after an investor call ahead of quarterly results.】

item.title: 特朗普向六国发出关税信函
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三向阿尔及利亚、文莱、伊拉克、利比亚、摩尔多瓦和菲律宾等六个国家发出了一轮关税函。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday issued a round of tariff letters to six countries, including Algeria, Brunei, Iraq, Libya, Moldova and the Philippines.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国利率至少高出 3 个点
item.description: "他说："'为时已晚'使美国每年在再融资成本上损失 3,600 亿美元。【原文："'Too Late' is costing the U.S. 360 Billion Dollars a Point, Per Year, in refinancing costs," he said.】
